Appraisd | London, UK | Front-end dev (VueJS) 1+ yr, Mid-level UX designer | Onsite | Full-time or contract | https://www.appraisd.com

We're hiring a junior front-end dev with some experience of a framework such as Vue, Angular or React to work with Vue in Typescript. Coaching provided. Full time, onsite.

We're also looking for a mid-level UX designer to help shape the future of our product. Contract leading to perm? Mostly onsite.

Appraisd is a small, rapidly-growing fun company developing a system that aims to change and improve the way people are managed through clever and simple design. We're bursting with ideas and need help implementing them!

Contact at: roly.walter at appraisd.com.
